name: >immutable
description:
Immutable is a puzzle game where you're not a hero: you're programming an AI hero!

There's only one catch: the AI can not forget previous instructions it has received, but you can rewind the action to correct your mistakes!

Through a sequence of puzzles with increasing difficulty, you'll quickly realize that the things learnt at the beginning of the level might disservice you by the end of it.

Therefore, knowledge is poison. 

Immutable is our submission for Mini Jam #129.

A game by Hadopire, Shatzy and Aureoreo.
Art based on petricakegames work.
